title: The translation of certaine psalmes into English verse by the Right Honourable, Francis Lo. Verulam, Viscount St. Alban.
author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
publisher: Printed for Hanna Barret, and Richard Whittaker, and are to be sold at the signe of the Kings Head in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: This work is not a translation so much as a paraphrase--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
STC 1174 on reel 871 is actually 1174.5--Cf. reel guide.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
